name: Bird&Bunny
description: This was one of the first games I made during my time at UCSC! Play as a girl with big arms, or a girl with big legs? Made using Unity for CMPM 80K (foundations of play.) I had a lot of fun animating the two playable characters. I was inspired to make this after seeing some Skullgirls animation sequences! smo0th m0tion is h0t
